title: [bug] cargo tauri info always shows "Webview2 & Visual Studio Build Tools" not installed

labels.name: scope: bundler
labels.description: The bundler used in our cli to make installers

body:
### Describe the bug

cargo tauri info always shows "Webview2 & Visual Studio Build Tools" not installed. 

But actually I have installed them already:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1064052/147388294-a21aed88-9cbf-472a-b19f-c65c206bc4a2.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1064052/147388314-4747d8d8-95d6-4323-99f6-8ebd8c2414bd.png)


### Reproduction

_No response_

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Platform and versions

```shell
Operating System - Windows, version 10.0.19043 X64
Webview2 - Not installed
Visual Studio Build Tools - Not installed

Node.js environment
  Node.js - 14.18.2
  @tauri-apps/cli - 1.0.0-beta.10
  @tauri-apps/api - 1.0.0-beta.8

Global packages
  npm - 6.14.15
  pnpm - Not installed
  yarn - 1.22.17

Rust environment
  rustc - 1.57.0
  cargo - 1.57.0

Rust environment
  rustup - 1.24.3
  rustc - 1.57.0
  cargo - 1.57.0
  toolchain - stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc (environment override by RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN)

App directory structure
/build
/node_modules
/public
/src
/src-tauri

App
  tauri.rs - 1.0.0-beta.8
  build-type - bundle
  CSP - default-src blob: data: filesystem: ws: wss: http: https: tauri: 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' 'self' img-src: 'self'
  distDir - ../build
  devPath - http://localhost:3000/
  framework - React
```


### Stack trace

_No response_

### Additional context
1) I use the next tauri-cli: cargo install tauri-cli --git https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri.git --branch next
2) And the installer will download Webview2 runtime every time, even if I have run the installer many times:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1064052/147388525-dbdde012-ad02-47cb-a843-3f652e1c8082.png)
